Uses of Package
org.xbmc.android.remote.business

  • Packages that use org.xbmc.android.remote.business 
    Package Description
    com.r00li.rhome  
    org.xbmc.android.remote.business  
    org.xbmc.android.util  
    org.xbmc.api.business  
    org.xbmc.api.presentation  
  • Classes in org.xbmc.android.remote.business used by com.r00li.rhome 
    Class and Description
    Command
    Class to asynchronous execute backend stuff and send the result back to the GUI.
  • Classes in org.xbmc.android.remote.business used by org.xbmc.android.remote.business 
    Class and Description
    AbstractManager
    Super class of the wrappers, keeps common code.
    AbstractThread
    Super class for all the cache threads.
    CacheManager 
    Command
    Class to asynchronous execute backend stuff and send the result back to the GUI.
    ControlManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    DiskCacheThread
    This thread asynchronously delivers sdcard-cached bitmaps.
    DownloadThread
    This thread asynchronously downloads thumbs from XBMC and returns them as Bitmap.
    EventClientManager
    Super class of the wrappers, keeps common code.
    InfoManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    ManagerThread
    Spawned on first access, then looping.
    MemCacheThread
    This thread asynchronously delivers memory-cached bitmaps.
    MusicManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    TvShowManager 
    VideoManager
    Asynchronously wraps the VideoClient class.
  • Classes in org.xbmc.android.remote.business used by org.xbmc.android.util 
    Class and Description
    NowPlayingPollerThread
    Activities (and other stuff) can subscribe to this thread in order to obtain real-time "Now playing" information.

    Class and Description
    Command
    Class to asynchronous execute backend stuff and send the result back to the GUI.
